title: Iran Commemorates Revolution, With U.S. Warships Lurking Off the Coast
summary_full: The authoritarian clerical regime in Tehran came to power in 1979. Today, it presides over a country that is deeply polarized and under threat of an American attack.
summary_public: The authoritarian clerical regime in Tehran came to power in 1979. Today, it presides over a country that is deeply polarized and under threat of an American attack.

IR.label: negative
IR.evidence: authoritarian clerical regime in Tehran...deeply polarized
